sentences.english: When I was pregnant, I could not have imagined breastfeeding in public.

sentences.english: But false hope is worse than no hope at all.
sentences.chinese: 但是，虛假的希望比壓根沒有希望更糟糕。

sentences.english: Perhaps simply did Michael Diao me, I Biao to come to Sri Lanka a big stick Ning.

sentences.english: The sun glared at them but they didn’t feel anything.

sentences.english: This conclusion lacks a solid legal foundation.

sentences.english: As for long-term loans for new ventures, it can forget them.

sentences.english: Ture, you don't have to pay much ---- or any ---- rent.

sentences.english: They are not at all what we mean today by "child-friendly."

sentences.english: I don't think Michelle Kwan is false at all.

sentences.english: A mother smell speech on the spot at ChenYan said no hate.

sentences.english: If I were Abramovich, I’d never have hired Ancelotti.

sentences.english: I know, but it's hard to fit a piano in a foxhole.

sentences.english: Not long ago you wouldn’t mention China and supercomputing in the same breath.
